初心者の方にはどうしても難しいゲームです。負け続ける覚悟が出来るのでしたら挑戦しても良いと思います。それと、課金をしないとキャラと有能な能力がそろわないので、そこも手を出し辛い理由なのかもしれません。プレイしていると、どうしても弱いプレイヤーを【煽る】行為があります。恐らくこの行為は無くならないものだと思います。相手を慮らない稚拙なプレイヤーはオンラインゲームの性みたいな所もありますので、そういうのも含めたゲームだと思って始めないと、やる気が一気に失せます。総括は、ゲーム自体は面白いです。ですが、難易度と一部のプレイヤーのモラルによって、手軽にお勧め出来ないゲームではあります。

Playing as a survivor is pain, you are supper mega dependent on whether or not your teammates does gens and save you from hooks (you always inevitably get downed if you get chased which is alright, you are just buying time for people to do gens and progress the game). You are basically rolling the dice, If you happen to get teammates that hide in lockers, or survivors that don't do gens even though there is no chance of escape other wise, you will slowly but surely get chased down and killed. Also AFK farming killers are annoying, face camping is ridiculous, and the fact some survivors don't know how to take advantage of them makes them very irritating. Bubba is a shitty killer that makes the skill necessary to play hillbilly literally irrelevant, also facecamping Bubbaas are so fucking annoying and Nurse is a stupid killer that says fuck you to the rules of the game and just teleports around and wins. To finish off, this game gets very boring after you lose due to teammates or experience the boredom and loneliness of playing killer ( first person is very nauseating), and if you stick around, these small little annoyances will stack up and make you not want to play the game, if you do get good at looping killers, and get to a rank where you get good teammates I can see you having fun (friends will help too), but this game is pretty beginner unfriendly due to the fact looping a killer is something you need to at least be decent at if you want to carry, which isn't god since you need to constantly be aware of where the next palate is, and to be sure of that you either need to know the layout of the map (comes with experience) or you need windows of opp, so yeah carrying or having fun as a beginner survivor is hard, and in my opinion, killer feels very lonely and clunky to play. I do think there are good things about this game, the killer powers are cool and the premise is fun, I might give this game another chance.
Fun unique experience in the fact that every game is different and fun to have fun in this game

Easy to learn, incredibly difficult to master. I can see myself playing this game for hundreds of hours and never getting bored because there's just so many facets to this deceptively simple game! There are so many different characters to play, and between the two roles of survivor and killer, becoming familiar with what each character does is no easy feat. I have absolutely loved playing this game both by myself and with friends (although most of my hours have been spent solo queuing), and I highly recommend it to most anyone. I know a lot of the negative reviews mention a toxic community with too many hackers, but in 46 hours I haven't come across anyone like that. I've even gotten a few gracious killers who have let me win as the last survivor!

Ever since the developer update the game has gone so bad for solo survivors like myself. Killers have the complete advantage and more. It is almost like Behaviour want to kill the game for solo players, they just do not punish killers who troll. I have just been in two games back to back where the killer slugged us all and waited for us to bleed out.... This is not fun. Its a real shame because i loved this game. I think it shows everything when it takes 2 seconds to get into a survivor game but 10 mins to get into a killer game. Clearly way more people are playing killer rather than survivor now.

tut mir leid, aber das Spiel macht einfach keinen Spaß mehr.. Camping ist bei dem Spiel erlaubt...wt.......es ist als Überlebender nicht mehr spielbar...so viele Perks nur mehr unnötig drinnen. es werden die Killer sowas von bevorzugt... Die sind nur mehr am tunneln und campen..da kann man in dem Spiel nur mehr feig spielen und sich in einen spint verstecken und abwarten bis die Hatch kommt oder eines der Ausgangstore nutzen und richtig timen...srry aber man muss definitiv dbd patchen......campen darf nicht erlaubt sein, so wie eine person zu tunneln obwohl sich zwei andere leute dazwischen hauen und gekonnt ignoriert werden. Ich bin seit Anfang an dabei mit Pausen, aber bald wird es für mich eine großßßßßßeeee Pause ohne wiederkommen sein, wenn nichts verändert wird
